titleStmt.title: Scripture a perfect rule for church-government delivered in a sermon at Margarets Westminster, before sundry of the House of Commons. By William Seigwich [sic] minister in Farnham in Essex. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neare the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neare the Exchange
